price: 208. Ma jirtona magaalo aan halaagno Annagoon marka hore u dirin Digayaal.
arabic: وَمَآ أَهۡلَكۡنَا مِن قَرۡيَةٍ إِلَّا لَهَا مُنذِرُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wamā ahlaknā min qaryatin illā lahā mundhirūna
